japanese: 「明日やるよ」「それ昨日も言ってた」
english: "I'll do it tomorrow." "You said that yesterday!"

japanese: あなたなんかもう知らない。
english: I don't know you anymore.

japanese: この辺でパンクしたタイヤを直せる場所あるかな？
english: Is there someplace around here that can fix a flat tire?

japanese: 眠たいだけだよ。
english: I just want to sleep.

japanese: 何階にお住まいですか？
english: Which floor do you live on?

japanese: どの階に住んでるの？
english: Which floor do you live on?

japanese: 黙ってればよかったのに。
english: You should have kept your mouth shut.

japanese: しゃべるべきじゃなかった。
english: I should have kept my mouth shut.

japanese: 口をつぐんでいるべきだった。
english: I should have kept my mouth shut.

japanese: 火星には２つの衛星がある。
english: Mars has two moons.

japanese: おじはこの時計をくれた。
english: My uncle gave me this watch.

japanese: 私は川に泳ぎに行った。
english: I went swimming in the river.

japanese: それを買うぐらいのお金は持ってるよ。
english: I have enough money to buy it.

japanese: 彼の家族は私を愛していた。
english: His family loved me.

japanese: トムはシャワーを浴びてから夕食を取った。
english: After taking a shower, Tom ate dinner.

japanese: 読書家のほうです。
english: I read a lot.

japanese: 彼女は十年間今の地位に居座っている。
english: She has remained in her present position for ten years.

japanese: 彼女はどこで生まれたの？
english: Where was she born?

japanese: ロシアは日本に北方領土を返す必要があります。
english: Russia must return the Northern Territories to Japan.

japanese: 彼の車は2年ものだ。
english: His car is two years old.

japanese: 外は寒いよ。
english: It is cold outside.

japanese: ケンタウルス座アルファ星には惑星がある。それは、ケンタウルス座アルファ星Bbである。
english: The star system Alpha Centauri has a planet called Alpha Centauri Bb.

japanese: これって、すごく嬉しい。
english: This makes me very happy.

japanese: それって、すごく嬉しい。
english: That makes me very happy.

japanese: 教師になりたいです。
english: I want to be a teacher.

japanese: 二度と教師はやりたくないってこと？
english: Are you saying you don't want to be a teacher anymore?

japanese: 誰も笑わなかったんだ。
english: No one laughed.

japanese: 誰のせいでもなかった。
english: It was no one's fault.

japanese: 公園には人っ子一人いなかった。
english: No one was in the park.

japanese: トムは周囲を見回したが、誰の姿も見なかった。
english: Tom looked around, but saw no one.

japanese: バスが止まったが、誰も降りなかった。
english: The bus stopped, but no one got out.

japanese: 誰にも言ってない。
english: I didn't tell anyone.

japanese: 彼女も美人です。
english: She's beautiful, too.

japanese: 電車に遅れないように気をつけるのよ。
english: Be careful not to miss the train.

japanese: 昨日あなたがしてくださったことに感謝しています。
english: I appreciate what you did yesterday.

japanese: 誰かに話した？
english: Did you tell anybody?

japanese: トムは誰かに話したの？
english: Did Tom tell anyone?

japanese: どなたか、聞こえますか？
english: Can anybody hear me?

japanese: 誰かケガした？
english: Anybody hurt?

japanese: その家の中には誰か他にいる？
english: Is anybody else in the house?

japanese: ボストンに知り合いいる？
english: Do you know anybody in Boston?

japanese: 誰のせいでもありません。
english: It's not anybody's fault.

japanese: 彼のことなら誰よりも分かってる。
english: I know him better than anybody.

japanese: 誰かここにいるの？
english: Is there anyone in here?

japanese: その辺に誰かいる？
english: Is there anyone else around?

japanese: あの家に誰か住んでるの？
english: Is there anyone living in that house?

japanese: 付き合っている人はいますか？
english: Are you dating anybody?

japanese: 付き合ってる人いる？
english: Are you dating anybody?

japanese: そこには誰か他の人がいたの？
english: Was anybody else there?

japanese: 他に誰か、けがをした人はいた？
english: Was anyone else injured?

japanese: 部屋には誰かいたの？
english: Was anyone in the room?

japanese: そこに誰かいたの？
english: Was anybody in there?

japanese: トムは誰かとデートしてたの？
english: Was Tom dating anyone?

japanese: 誰かに聞いてみて。
english: Ask anyone.

japanese: 誰にでも起こりうることだ。
english: It could happen to anyone.

japanese: 何茸か分からないんだったら、採らない方がいいよ。
english: If you don't know what kind of mushroom it is, better not take it.
